verses.roman:
eta kahi' mahāprabhu abhyantare gelā
gosāñira āveśa dekhi' sabe mauna hailā

synonyms: eta kahi'-saying this; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; abhyantare gelā—entered His room; gosāñira—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; āveśa—absorption in anger; dekhi'-seeing; sabe—all the devotees; mauna hailā—became silent.
translation: After saying this, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu entered His room. Seeing Him in such an angry mood, all the devotees fell silent.
